import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Dashboard.css'; function TrainerProfile() { const { id } = useParams(); const [trainer, setTrainer] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:8000/trainers/${id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setTrainer(data); setLoading(false); }); }, [id]); if (loading) { return (
